Description:
Picture-perfect home with mesmerising views!
Youll love:
The captivating panoramic views across rolling farmland all the way to the Southern Ocean in this picture-perfect, Mark Gleeson-built home thats on 3136m2 approx.
Sliding back the doors of the modern open plan interior & enjoying the laid-back outdoor entertaining area that has landscaped gardens, a swimming pool & a woodfire pizza oven.
All the high-quality fittings & finishes throughout including beautiful Blackbutt timber floors & built-in hardwood joinery, high ceilings, hydronic heating & well-thought-out storage options.
Cosying up in front of the wood heater & watching Mother Nature at her best through the huge double-glazed windows in the main living area.
Plus:
The stunning kitchen also has a large sliding window that opens onto the outdoor entertaining area & overlooks the solar heated pool.
The master bedroom has soft & luxurious carpet, a spacious WIR & an ensuite spa bath with ocean views!
Bedrooms 2 & 3 are also spacious; each with floor-to-ceiling BIRs along one wall & an impressive outlook.
Other clever design features include a mudroom off the large main carport with added storage.
Downstairs also has a 4th bedroom & 3rd bathroom, plus a huge workshop with a kitchenette, a wood fired oven & extra parking space.
The property also has 2 x 30,000L water tanks, native bush landscaping, dual driveway access, secure perimeter fencing & much more you wont regret an inspection!
Private inspections welcome at this time.
Insights: 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Exceptional Elevated Family Home with Huge Alfresco!
Set on a spacious 766m2(Approx.) corner allotment, this spacious Ex Jennings display home comes with all the added extras that the modern family requires. Perfectly positioned in this quiet location but only minutes to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Epworth Hospital, Deakin University, Waurn Ponds Train Station, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour.
This immaculate and well-presented family home is sure to impress the astute buyer. Step inside to the formal entry hall, the front formal lounge with elevated views from the large windows and a separate family dining area.
Comprising of three bedrooms - The master features a walk-in robe and ensuite. The 2 additional bedrooms have a separate wing that share a central bathroom and toilet. The open plan kitchen, dining and living area offers the perfect place to entertain and opens up onto the huge rear alfresco. The kitchen features loads of storage and ample bench space, quality appliances and gas cooking as well as stone benchtop. Central gas ducted heating, 2 x air conditioning units and ceiling fans throughout for year-round climate control along with 6 x Solar Panels, a garden irrigation system, security system and many other features this home really has the lot. The second living zone offers flexibility and a place to relax and unwind with stunning cathedral style roof and windows.
Outside boasts a massive undercover alfresco area with low maintenance gardens, a garden shed, a remote double lock up garage and rear roller door access into the yard. Don't miss your opportunity to inspect this impressive home today.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Stunning in Design and Perfectly Located
Stunning in design and perfectly located within a short stroll to the ever-popular Highton Village. This chic upmarket townhouse offers low maintenance convenient living. The modern architecture combined with the latest luxury fixtures and fittings ensures the lucky purchaser a daily life of ease. The home comprises of three large bedrooms, the master bedroom with full ensuite and spacious walk-in robe, the large central bathroom complete with bath, separate shower and feature tiles service the other bedrooms. The open plan kitchen/meals / living area has access to a large outdoor dining area fantastic for entertaining and the landscaped courtyard offers plenty of recreational space. The kitchen is equipped for the best of chefs including stone benchtops, European appliances and a sleek modern design which complements the stunning architecture of the home. An excellent opportunity perfect for the downsizer, young professionals, an astute investor, or anyone looking for low maintenance living. Conveniently located to all the shopping that Highton Village offers including boutique shops, cafes, restaurants, supermarket and much more.
- Modern in design with two separate living zones
- Upmarket fixtures and fittings and stunning timber floors
- Heating and cooling
- Double lock-up garage with internal access
- Large outdoor space fantastic for entertaining
- Centrally located with all amenities on the doorstep
- Great for the Melbourne commuter

Description:
Bespoke Family Home With Breathtaking Views
Less than five years old, this bespoke 'Pivot Homes' residence takes fine family living to a whole new level. The on-trend interiors exude quality, while the north-facing living zone and yard showcase soaring views over the Moorabool Valley and You Yangs.
- Close to the Barwon River and Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza
- Striking entrance with void and timber floating staircase
- Tassie Oak floorboards and burnished concrete floors
- Open plan living zone unites with the north-facing balcony
- Kitchen boasts stone benchtops, w/in pantry, European apps
- Family room opens onto the generous, landscaped backyard
- Master BR is graced with views, large w/in robe, en suite
- Two BRs with b/in robes, stunning bathroom, study nook
- Double-glazing, ducted heating, ref. cooling, gas log fire
- Remote double l/up garage; side access for trailer or caravan

Description:
Quiet Court Location on 817sqm
The Feel:
Looking for a family home with extra space & the security of a court location? Look no further than this impeccably presented 3-bedroom home, with dual living, study, well-appointed kitchen & a huge backyard with room to extend in future. Ideally positioned between the CBD & the coast, this residence enjoys a private position with the Bellarine Rail Trail directly behind your fence for regular walks or rides. Delivering on quality & practicality, it provides easy, low maintenance living.
The Facts:
-3BR family home set on a substantial 817sqm allotment
-Neatly presented & privately tucked away at the end of Melissa Crt
-Natural light filled open plan living, meals & kitchen
-S/S apps include: Westinghouse electric oven, gas hob & Bosch dishwasher
-Direct access to outdoor entertaining area
-Neutral tones including quality tiled flooring, & carpets in bedrooms/formal living room
-Master bedroom with WIR & en suite (shower, vanity, WC)
-Zoned minor BRs with BIRs, family bathroom (bath/shower/vanity/sep WC) & laundry
-Study/home office located at front entry adjacent to Master
-Enviable storage throughout
-Ducted heating/evaporative cooling + ceiling fans
-Sealed driveway & paths with established plants & screen trees
-3,400L of rainwater storage + 3x3m garden shed
-Potential for extension in future with sunny orientation (STCA)
-Monitored security system
-OSP & DLUG, plus rear yard access to store a trailer/boat/caravan
-Pedestrian walkway to bordering Bellarine Rail Trail for daily family walks & rides
-A few short minutes by car to school, sporting clubs & Gateway Plaza shops
-10mins to Geelong CBD & 15mins to beach & cafes in Ocean Grove
The Owner Loves.
We love the quiet court position & its such a friendly neighbourhood... its central to everything a family needs & only a few minutes to the Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre, schools & sporting clubs.

Description:
With a Growing Family in Mind
This ideally located property is perfect for any growing family. Offering an expansive backyard and multiple living zones, there is plenty of room for everyone. Located within close proximity to Dorothy Street shopping strip, local parks, and Leopold Primary School, this home is sure to impress and tick many of your boxes.
Presenting four generous sized bedrooms, main, located at the front of the home, and containing his & hers walk through robes which lead into a 2-way ensuite. The remaining three bedrooms offer built-in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet.
The home includes a fully carpeted formal lounge with gas heating and split system cooling, adjoined with a large separate family room, ideal for casual living. The fully upgraded kitchen features stone benchtops, gas cooktop, built-in oven, stainless-steel dishwasher, ample cupboard space and overlooks the dining area, all of which is illuminated with natural light.
The property occupies 657m2 meaning a spacious backyard for all to enjoy, complete with a wonderful, elevated undercover alfresco area. This family-friendly yard is further accompanied by a garage/workshop, a garden shed for extra storage and an undercover carport for vehicle accommodation. Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity in an undeniably prime location of Leopold.

Situated in the family friendly Quay 2 Estate this 392m2 (approx.) parcel of land is titled, fully serviced, and waiting for you to build your new home or investment property. It is conveniently located close to child-care, primary and secondary schools, Dunes Shopping Village, sporting and medical facilities, parks, playgrounds and only a few minutes drive to Torquay town centre and the many beaches along the Surf Coast. Call today for further information.

Address: 51 Golf Links Road Barwon Heads VIC 3227
Description:
The Essence of Barwon Heads Living
The Feel:
Classic beach house vibes that capture the essence of Barwon Heads living are felt throughout this aesthetically beautiful, SouEast Homes designed & constructed home. Polished concrete floors, dual living zones, a central hub under raked ceilings, 3 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms make clever use of space. Set on a large block with an abundance of desirable north-oriented outdoor entertaining space & decking, you will spend as much as your life outdoors amongst the established gardens, as you will within...
The Facts:
-Coastal home that embraces sunny outdoor living & entertaining
-Custom-designed by SouEast Homes, featuring historic Barwon Heads bridge timbers
-Central location in walking distance to school, village shops, river & beach
-Brightly lit OP kitchen, living & dining area with sliding doors for natural ventilation
-Galley kitchen features central breakfast bar, quality s/s apps, & clever hideaway nook
-Well-resolved floor plan maximises space to include 2 living areas, 3 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms
-Master with direct access to protected corner of the deck provides a relaxed sitting area
-Walk-thru robe flows to light-filled en suite with luxurious in situ shower
-2 further BRs with BIRs
-Central family bathroom with large shower, bath & separate toilet
-Ducted gas heating throughout, SSAC & gas log fire in main living, ceiling fans
-Fully fenced back garden for children & pets, raised vegie beds
-In-ground Olympic size trampoline
-Oversized DLUG w/ storage & single rear roller door for extra vehicle/trailer/boat storage
-Exposed aggregate concrete driveway & paths
-5,000ltr water tank plumbed to toilets & garden
-Ideal for families, young professionals, weekenders or a secure investment property
Owner Loves....
We love the seamless flow onto the sunny wraparound deck overlooking the grassy backyard. Its an amazing place to entertain and the kids love the in-ground trampoline.

Description:
BREAMLEA BUYING AT ITS BEST
Seize this prime opportunity to have your own piece of paradise, ideally located between the surf and the wetland is this relaxed family or holiday home that is the epitome of coastal living. This timeless, timber beach house showcases a bright, laid-back and functional interior via an open layout, loads of glass and recycled timber floors.
Comprising four spacious bedrooms all with robes, separate study, central main bathroom plus second shower and toilet combo, good size laundry and an open plan and updated kitchen with butlers pantry that looks out onto the meals and living area with a superb vista of the wetlands.
Add to this an extensive deck perfect for entertaining family and friends, second living area, off street parking and additional features including split system heating / cooling, combustion heater, solar panels (3.8 kilowatt), cathedral ceiling, solar hot water, water tanks and low maintenance gardens.
Rarely do opportunities present themselves to the market in Breamlea so call today to inspect.
Insights: 27 Horwood Drive, Breamlea VIC 3227 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Immaculate, Low Maintenance Unit in Ideal Location
A sensational opportunity for first home buyers, savvy investors or downsizer to take advantage of this well-presented single level unit. Located in a block of 4 and convenient to transport and local shopping and leisure centres. Comfortable and with a practical floor plan, its generous kitchen/meals area feeds into a carpeted open-plan living room with sliding doors to a private rear courtyard. Both bedrooms are spacious with built in robes and the central bathroom is bright, so too is the laundry. Other features include split system air conditioning/heating, single garage and a low maintenance garden. Currently tenanted at $320pw to a tenants most willing to remain in occupation.

This two-bedroom home consists of main central bathroom, generous living area and versatile kitchen with gas cooking and ample storage space. Description:
Stylish & Practical Family Living
If you're looking for the perfect family home without compromising on lifestyle, then don't go past this ideal single-level residence. Offering spacious luxury and elegant contemporary living, this property will leave you wanting nothing more.
A location with parks, playgrounds and sporting facilities just a short stroll away, as well as a short drive to the Leopold Gateway Plaza and easy access through to Geelong CBD.
This free-flowing floorplan offers four generously sized bedrooms, main bedroom offering a deluxe private ensuite and walk-in rob, while remaining three bedrooms contain built in robes and utilise the classy, central bathroom and separate toilet.
The ultra-modern kitchen boasts impressive bench space with custom cabinetry, high-quality, stainless-steel appliances including a dishwasher, free standing gas oven/ cooktop and rangehood. All overlooking the wonderfully open & spacious family and dining area, which leads through to the large separate living.
Additional features of this value-packed home include a separate laundry, split system heating/cooling, low maintenance landscaped garden with an impressive decked outdoor entertaining area, and a remote-controlled double garage with internal and external access.
Investors will appreciate the value, and first homebuyers can enter the market with certainty in a fast-growing, family-friendly community. Inspect today!
Insights: 12 Ebbtide Drive, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
8 ACRES IN CERES! Open by private inspection only
This grand lifestyle residence with impressive hill-top positioning and sweeping views of Ceres and its surrounds will captivate each and every individual. Within short commuting distance of both Geelong and Melbourne, this homestead style property could be yours. Offering an exceptional opportunity to acquire approx. 8 acres located in Ceres in the rolling hills of Barrabool where peace and tranquillity become a way of life. Enjoy a cup of tea on the verandah that wraps around the entirety of the home allowing you to be captivated by what surrounds you.
Kitchen- double sink, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, copious amount of timber paneled cabinetry storage including overhead cupboards, island bench with plenty of space for preparation, windows wrapping around the kitchen for glorious views of your large outdoor space, slate tiling throughout and a spacious walk in pantry
Open plan living/ dining- slate tiling throughout, ceiling fan, downlights, pendant lighting, sky lights, fireplace, glass panel doors opening out to alfresco, curtains for privacy, linen press, split system cooling
Study- slate tiling throughout, door to verandah, downlights, pendant light
Dining- secluded next door to kitchen with door to shut it off, large windows with beautiful views, slate tiling throughout, pendant lighting suspended from decorative ceiling rose, a fully functional bar space to serve your guests
Sitting room- carpeted, large open windows facing out to views of your property and its surrounds (Melbourne can be spotted from here), pendant lighting suspended from decorative ceiling rose, pendant wall lighting, fire place, shelving for decorative pieces, steps up into formal dining space and bar
Master bedroom- carpeted, ceiling fan, downlights, door for access to verandah, large walk in robe, dressing room and ensuite with double vanity, twin sinks and large cupboards, spa bath, timber panel detailed walls, window with stunning views, shower, separate toilet
Bedrooms 2- carpet, ceiling fan, downlights, access to bathroom, separate study section and large walk in robe
Bedroom 3- carpet, ceiling fan, downlights, access to bathroom
Guest bedroom- carpet, ceiling fan, downlights, door to verandah, ensuite with single vanity, shower, easy access to powder room
Main bathroom- separate powder room, double vanity, twin sinks, bath, shower, access from both bedrooms, powder room can be accessed from hallway for guests
Studio- separate to main house, carpet, storage, split system cooling
Outdoor- long driveway leading into the property secluding your home and providing tranquility and privacy, double garage, double carpet, 3x sheds, 2x undercover storage spaces, verandah wrapping around the home for 360 degree views of Ceres, Geelong and its surrounds, luscious established vegetation and well manicured lawns and gardens surrounding the property, 3x large water tanks
Mod cons- slate tiling and carpets throughout, laundry with large bench space, intercom and radio system through entirety of property, fireplace in both living spaces
Close by facilities: 45 minute drive to Melbourne, 15 minute drive to Geelong, 8 minute drive to Waurn Ponds train station, 5 minute drive to Deakin University (all approx)
Views: ocean, river, You Yangs, Brisbane Ranges, Melbourne, sweeping views of Geelong and its surrounds
Ideal for: families, growing families, retirees, couples, investors
*ALL ATTENDEES MUST SHOW PHOTO ID PRIOR TO VIEWING THE HOME*

Description:
North facing downsize, walk to shops.
On offer is a fantastic family residence situated in a prime Grovedale location. Ideally located within walking distance to Waurn Ponds Shopping mecca, Mandama and Nazareth Primary School and just a stone's throw away from Deakin University, Epworth Hospital with easy access to the Ring Road for commuters and beach lovers, a very convenient lifestyle can be enjoyed by all.
This fantastic family home offers three bedrooms, master with large walk in robe and two-way bathroom. The remanding two bedrooms both with built in robes and are all serviced by the central two-way bathroom. Two separate living spaces allows for flexible family living for the entire family, with the main family living flowing seamlessly out onto the outdoor undercover patio.
Featuring a heated slab throughout, ceiling fans, dishwasher, an abundance of storage space, double lock up garage and a European laundry, this property will not disappoint. Sure to appeal to an array of buyers, this property is bound to impress upon inspection.

The home boasts 4 spacious bedrooms, large lounge room and separate dining area, functional spacious kitchen and adjoining meals area. Description:
A sunny, spacious & delightful home!
Youll love:
A combination of high ceilings & other design features in this custom-built Hamlan home including its excellent passive solar design, thermal and acoustic insulation & more.
The large, central & grassy courtyard area that faces north and floods the beautiful interiors with natural light all year round.
Quality finishes & materials used throughout like the stone kitchen island benchtop and bathroom vanities, Smeg appliances, Bamboo flooring & delightful Silvertop Ash decking.
Plus:
The clever floorplan has a wonderful, spacious feel throughout and consists of zoned living with 3 bedrooms including the master with ensuite (all with BIRs + ceiling fans) plus a separate study.
The private outdoor spaces are ideal for entertaining in with lots of undercover areas, built-in seating, a hot & cold shower, 12v garden lighting plus a cubby house & sand pit for the kids.
Theres also central ducted heating throughout plus a ceiling fan in the main living area, double glazing, plenty of storage options, a double remote garage & more.
This is a convenient family locale thats walking distance to several schools & day care options, with all of Torquays beaches & shopping districts only a few minutes drive away.

Description:
MODERN LIFESTYLE AND PERFECT LOCATION!!
Ideally located only moments from schools, childcare, parks, transport links and the Quay shopping village this single level, Dennehy built home will appeal to many, stylish in design and contemporary in appearance, it delivers a well resolved floor plan that caters beautifully to the practicalities of modern-day living for the entire family. The home comprises of a boundless, sun drenched open plan kitchen / dining / living zone, 3 bedrooms all with BIR's, roomy master with full en-suite including freestanding spa bath and walk thru WIR, separate second living room, family bathroom, an inviting undercover, outdoor decked alfresco space with ceiling fan boasting a northerly aspect, as well as an extra wide double lock up garage with additional double carport providing enough space to store a caravan or boat (or both). Featuring reverse cycle air conditioning to the bedrooms and living areas, gas log fire, blackbutt timber floorboards, stone bench tops, 900mm cooktop and oven, walk in pantry, outdoor shower with hot water, water tank and a 5kw solar system.
Situated on a 630m2 allotment with easy to maintain gardens this magnificent property is perfectly suited to families, downsizers and shrewd investors alike. For further information on this fantastic property call today.
Insights: 78 Centreside Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 126 other 3 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
QUIET CENTRAL TORQUAY LOCATION
A classic double storey home awaits those seeking peace and quiet in the tightly held and much loved Church Estate. The 4 bedroom property caters for those looking for a spacious permanent residence or alternatively a solid holiday retreat that can accommodate family and friends. The properties rear northern orientation not only captures plenty of natural light all day long but is the perfect environment to relax on the oversized rear deck or enjoy the well-manicured backyard.
The many endearing features of this home include: foyer entry area, 2 large bedrooms and a bathroom with separate toilets on both levels, lounge/billiard room, separate bar room, large functional kitchen, dining area, spacious family room, reverse cycle air conditioning, ducted heating, ducted cooling, large laundry, double garage, carport, well established front and rear gardens and much more.
Situated on a magnificent 656m2 allotment in a quiet court location with Spring Creek and Torquay township a short stroll away allowing the occupants the ability to be amongst all Torquays offerings at will. With minimal restrictions on development (STCA) and world renown beaches at your door step, the opportunity to put your stamp on a well located property is here.

Description:
Brand New Belmont Beauty!
{Due to the current situation, one on one appointments will be conducted as needed, public open homes will not be conducted. We ask that everyone adheres to the current government guidelines regarding social distancing and hygiene}
If you want a new home, but dont want to be too far out, or cant be bothered waiting for builders to finish, then this is the one for you! It has only just been completed and ticks all the boxes for the fussy buyer.
Some features include:
3br with Built in Robes, main with ensuite
North facing, open living area and nice, sheltered backyard
Generous single garage with auto rollerdoor
LED lights throughout
Ducted gas heating and split system cooling and heating
This Lovely, compact, detached home represents fantastic value and would make an ideal first home, investment or downsizer. If you dont like the idea of being stuck out in the new subdivisions but want a new house in a private convenient location, then this brand-new, cleverly laid out home is a must to inspect.
Phone Jackson Wilson on 0418991988
